page.title: 06FOOTBALL HOOLIGANISM
page.content: Over the recent weeks,there has been alot of{football hooliganism}but the worst tragedy of hooligans took place in{Brussels},where the{European cup {final}was played between{Liverpool}and Juventus ,and because of the rioting a wall collapsed and{38 Italians}and{1 {Belgian}lost their lives.We asked the class what they thought of football hooligans.Some thought it made them very sad or{ashamed.}Others thought it was{idiotic.}They thought the selling of{drinks}should be stopped.Some thought the game should be played behind closed{doors}and they were scared to go to{football matches.One {teacher}said that people{don't realize {how bad it is.}They only know,if they are there{themselves.Another teacher {has to}decide which{fans}don't cause trouble so she can take her{son}to a match.
